text: [Applause]
who in your family taught you how to
cook and if if they did did they use
lorries oh
that's a great question but my family is
from louisiana so we use tony's it's got
a little bit more flavor in it but my
mom told me how to cook
she had a catering company that she ran
from the house and very much against the
law she threw me an apron at like five
years old and i had to help out to keep
the lights on so i want to know who
taught you how to dress i feel
underdressed sitting beside you here
right it's all right we can work that
out
you got the memo we flashed okay that's
this i knew if i was coming on your
shoulder and i had to step out right i
had to show up
how did you get afro-caribbean food into
the fine dining world at a young age you
know i started my own catering company
when i was like 20 years old but i sold
candy on the subway just to fund my
first business you know and then
after i did that then i got into
culinary school and then i got my foot
in the door in like some of the best
restaurants in the world
i got an opportunity to open my first
restaurant and you know with that i
wanted to cook food for my culture i
feel like the black experience is not
monolithic you know there's so many
layers so we're able to
showcase
so much culture on a plate you could
really travel an ocean on a plate and
you can show people a little bit of your
world and that's what i do with my food
i showed them a little bit of my way and
that's how you got that jacket
let me tell you something this man got
some you got these brussels sprouts
brussels sprouts the crispy brussels
sprouts how are you looking how are you
going to eat some soup you see
i didn't have a lot of people try to
make me brussels sprouts
and none of them worked you got it you
got a balance
why do you get them crispy like that i
mean i can't tell you all myself
i'm gonna show you a little something in
the kitchen i need to know i need to
know okay because you got this highly
anticipated cookbook coming called my
america recipes from a young black chef
and that comes out next year right
mm-hmm now yes is the recipe for the

got to get the book and
see what's in there
